title: 'DAMAGED AND NO WARRANTY EVEN FOR 2 MONTHS. WORST EXPERIENCE EVER!!!!!!'
body: 'I AM LITERALLY MAD AND SO DISAPPOINTED WITH THE PURCHASE OF THIS SHOES. I had bought it 2 months back and withing 1.5 months the shoes is damaged. the WORST PART is that when I inquired with amazon they told me that there is no warranty for this product. The in-store purchase has a warranty for 3 months but its not there while purchasing from Amazon! Why is it like that?? They should have mentioned it on the site somewhere with the product details that they do not provide warranty for this particular item.'
